Special Containment Procedures:
 SCP-8905 is to be contained inside a desktop computer with an NIVIDIA 4090 and an Intel Core i9-14900KS complete with a Kingston Fury Beast DDR5 RGB RAM with Windows 11 installed.


Description:
 SCP-8905 is a Windows 11 computer virus disguised as Google Chrome that can and will leak your Social Security Number, Passwords, Search History, Playstation and Xbox party chats, Tinder dates and your Digital Footprint to everybody you know.


You will know you have been affected by SCP-8905 because your monitor will become frozen and show 
this
 image


The person who made this virus and his whereabouts are unknown and the SCP foundation is still actively searching for him to this day.


The virus targets Google Chrome users and people who look up pornography online and strangly enough after you get affected by this virus you die of a cardiac arrest in 15 days.


There is no solutions that we know of to fix your computer from SCP-8905 we are actively researching a solution to this virus.
